<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxLifetime = TotalLifetime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Access density is accesses per byte. Multiply by 100 to include the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fractional part.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalAccessDensity = AccessCount &#42; 100 / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinAccessDensity = TotalAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxAccessDensity = TotalAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lifetime access density is the access density per second of lifetime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiply by 1000 to convert denominator lifetime to seconds (using a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimum lifetime of 1ms to avoid divide by 0 Do the multiplication first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to reduce truncations to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalLifetimeAccessDensity =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalAccessDensity &#42; 1000 / (TotalLifetime ? TotalLifetime : 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinLifetimeAccessDensity = TotalLifetimeAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxLifetimeAccessDensity = TotalLifetimeAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AllocCpuId = AllocCpu;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DeallocCpuId = DeallocCpu;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumMigratedCpu = AllocCpuId != DeallocCpuId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AccessHistogramSize = HistogramSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AccessHistogram = Histogram;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600clausemergepass-cpp/#aba99928790de45fa7aa12b47fbd828ff">Merge</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemInfoBlock &amp;newMIB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AllocCount += newMIB.AllocCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalAccessCount += newMIB.TotalAccessCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinAccessCount = newMIB.MinAccessCount &lt; MinAccessCount ? newMIB.MinAccessCount : MinAccessCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxAccessCount = newMIB.MaxAccessCount &gt; MaxAccessCount ? newMIB.MaxAccessCount : MaxAccessCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalSize += newMIB.TotalSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinSize = newMIB.MinSize &lt; MinSize ? newMIB.MinSize : MinSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxSize = newMIB.MaxSize &gt; MaxSize ? newMIB.MaxSize : MaxSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalLifetime += newMIB.TotalLifetime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinLifetime = newMIB.MinLifetime &lt; MinLifetime ? newMIB.MinLifetime : MinLifetime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxLifetime = newMIB.MaxLifetime &gt; MaxLifetime ? newMIB.MaxLifetime : MaxLifetime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalAccessDensity += newMIB.TotalAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinAccessDensity = newMIB.MinAccessDensity &lt; MinAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         ? newMIB.MinAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         : MinAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxAccessDensity = newMIB.MaxAccessDensity &gt; MaxAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         ? newMIB.MaxAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         : MaxAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TotalLifetimeAccessDensity += newMIB.TotalLifetimeAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinLifetimeAccessDensity =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      newMIB.MinLifetimeAccessDensity &lt; MinLifetimeAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? newMIB.MinLifetimeAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : MinLifetimeAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaxLifetimeAccessDensity =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      newMIB.MaxLifetimeAccessDensity &gt; MaxLifetimeAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? newMIB.MaxLifetimeAccessDensity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : MaxLifetimeAccessDensity;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know newMIB was deallocated later, so just need to check if it was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocated before last one deallocated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumLifetimeOverlaps += newMIB.AllocTimestamp &lt; DeallocTimestamp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AllocTimestamp = newMIB.AllocTimestamp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DeallocTimestamp = newMIB.DeallocTimestamp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumSameAllocCpu += AllocCpuId == newMIB.AllocCpuId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumSameDeallocCpu += DeallocCpuId == newMIB.DeallocCpuId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AllocCpuId = newMIB.AllocCpuId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DeallocCpuId = newMIB.DeallocCpuId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For merging histograms, we always keep the longer histogram, and add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values of shorter histogram to larger one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uintptr&#95;t ShorterHistogram;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t ShorterHistogramSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (newMIB.AccessHistogramSize &gt; AccessHistogramSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShorterHistogram = AccessHistogram;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShorterHistogramSize = AccessHistogramSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Swap histogram of current to larger histogram</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AccessHistogram = newMIB.AccessHistogram;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AccessHistogramSize = newMIB.AccessHistogramSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShorterHistogram = newMIB.AccessHistogram;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShorterHistogramSize = newMIB.AccessHistogramSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; ShorterHistogramSize; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ((uint64&#95;t &#42;)AccessHistogram)&#91;i&#93; += ((uint64&#95;t &#42;)ShorterHistogram)&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef &#95;MSC&#95;VER</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; &#95;&#95;pragma(pack(pop));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95;((&#95;&#95;packed&#95;&#95;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace memprof</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
